member.name: IExplorerCommandProvider.GetCommand
member.summary: Gets a specified Explorer command instance.
member.param: A reference to a command ID as a GUID. Used to obtain a command definition.
A reference to the IID of the requested interface.
When this function returns, contains the interface pointer requested in riid. This will typically be .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IExplorerCommandProvider.GetCommands
member.summary: Gets a specified Explorer command enumerator instance.
member.param: A pointer to an interface used to set a site.
A reference to the IID of the requested interface.
When this function returns, contains the interface pointer requested in riid. This will typically be .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IExplorerCommandProvider
member.summary: Exposes methods to create Explorer commands and command enumerators.
